description: Critically Healing an ally grants them a [n]8195[/n] Damage Shield for 8 seconds. This effect has a cooldown of 6 seconds.
Adds [n]345[/n] Weapon Damage to your damaging abilities when you use them to attack an enemy from behind.
When you deal melee damage, you have a [n]20%[/n] cance to apply Minor Maim to all enemies within 8 meters of you for 5 seconds, reducing their damage done by [n]15%[/n]
Reduce the Magicka cost of abilities by [n]8%[/n].

When you die, you instead become immune to all negative effects and healing for 3 seconds. When the effect ends, you heal for [n]17200[/n] Health and explode for [n]8600[/n] Flame Damage to all enemies within 8 meters. This effect can occur once every 10 minutes.
Reduces the cost of Sprint by [n]50%[/n]. While Sprinting, restore [n]1000[/n] Magicka every 1 second.
Gain Minor Aegis at all times, reducing your damage taken from Dungeon and Trial Monsters by [n]5%[/n].

When you die, you instead turn into a statue for 3 seconds and gain [n]200[/n] Ultimate. While a statue you are immune to all negative effects but can still be healed. This effect can occur once every 10 minutes.
When you Roll Dodge through an enemy, you deal [n]1932[/n] Physical Damage and knocks them down for 3 seconds.
Increases your Weapon and Spell Damage by [n]154[/n]. Increases the Magicka and Stamina restored from the Constitution passive ability by [n]40%[/n].
While you are casting or channeling an ability, your damage taken is reduced by [n]15%[/n].
When you dodge an attack, your Light and Heavy Attacks deal an additional [n]1225[/n] damage for 8 seconds.
While you have a Destruction Staff equipped, your Max Magicka is increased by [n]2400[/n].
When you use Roll Dodge, your Weapon Damage is increased by [n]420[/n] and Weapon Critical by [n]657[/n] for 5 seconds.
Increases your Physical And Spell Resistance by up to [n]11904[/n] based on your missing Health
Adds [n]400[/n] Spell Damage to your Flame Damage abilities
When you use an ability that costs Stamina, your Light Attacks deal an additional [n]774[/n] damage and Heavy Attacks deal an additional [n]1161[/n] damage for 10 seconds.
Gain a damage shield that absorbs [n]5000[/n] damage every 15 seconds.
When you deal damage with a Magicka ability, your Poison and Disease Damage abilities gain an additional [n]450[/n] Weapon Damage for 10 seconds.
Reduce the range you can be detected while hidden by 2 meters. Reduces crouch cost by [n]25%[/n]
Reduce damage taken from players by [n]5%[/n]

When you take damage from a spell, you have a [n]10%[/n] chance to gain a damage shield that absorbs [n]2580[/n] damage for 6 seconds when damaged by a spell. This effect can occur once every 4 seconds
When you take damage, you have a [n]6%[/n] chance to generate 15 Ultimate and increase your Physical and Spell Resistance by [n]6450[/n] for 6 seconds. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds

When you deal damage, you have a [n]5%[/n] chance to summon a shadowy Clanfear for 15 seconds. The Clanfear's basic attack deals [n]3440[/n] Physical Damage and apply Minor Maim to any enemy hit for 3 seconds, reducing their damage done by [n]15%[/n]. This effect can occur once every 15 seconds.
When you use a heal ability, you have a [n]15%[/n] chance to summon a strangler sapling that heals you or an ally for [n]19565[/n] Health over 4 seconds. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.

When you deal damage, you have a [n]10%[/n] chance to spawn dreugh limbs that create schockwaves in front of you dealing [n]1300[/n] Physical Damage every 0.4 seconds for 1.2 seconds. This effect can occur every 3 seconds
Gain Minor Berserk at all times, increasing your damage done by [n]8%[/n]
When you deal damage, you have a [n]20%[/n] chance to spawn 3 disease spores in front of you that deal [n]10320[/n] Disease Damage to the first enemy hit. Thie effect can occur once every 9 seconds

When you take damage, you have a [n]50%[/n] chance to summon a shadow orb for 10 seconds that increases the Physical and Spell Resistance of you and your allies whitin 5 meters by [n]3870[/n]. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.
Gain Major Ward and Major Resolve at all times, increasing your Physical and Spell Resistance by [n]5280[/n].

When you deal damage, you have a [n]10%[/n] chance to create an earthquake under the enemy that errupts after 2 seconds, dealing [n]3870[/n] Physical Damage to all enemies within 4 meters and stunning them for 3 seconds. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.
When you heal a friendly target, if they are still below [n]60%[/n] Health, their Health Recovery is increased by [n]1548[/n] for 10 seconds.

When you deal direct melee damage, you have a [n]15%[/n] chance to call on a primal spirit that mauls the closest enemy in front of you for [n]12000[/n] Physical Damage. This effect can occur once every 4 seconds.

When you take damage, you have a [n]6%[/n] chance to create a beam that steals [n]5805[/n] Health over 4 seconds from the attacker. The beam breaks from enemy moves further than 8 meters away. While the beam holds gain [n]30%[/n] increased healing received. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds.

When you use a damage shield ability, you have a [n]50%[/n] chance to lob 3 mortars over 2 seconds at the further enemy from you that each deal [n]5500[/n] Flame Damage to all enemies within 5 meters of the blast area. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds.

When you deal Critical Damage, you have a [n]20%[/n] chance to gain a damage shield that absorbs [n]8600[/n] damage for 6 seconds. While the damage shield holds, you deal [n]770[/n] Cold Damage to all enemies within 5 meters of you every 1 second. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds.

When you deal damage, you have a [n]10%[/n] chance to create lava pools that swirl around you, dealing [n]2000[/n] Flame Damage to all enemies within 8 meters of you every 1 second for 5 seconds. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.

When you deal direct damage, you have a [n]10%[/n] chance to summon a Lich crystal that explodes after 3 seconds, dealing [n]7408[/n] Magic Damage to all enemies within 4 meters. This effect can occur once every 3 seconds.

When you deal damage with a damage over time effect, you have an [n]8%[/n] chance to summon a meteor that deals [n]9000[/n] Flame Damage to target and [n]4000[/n] Flame Damage all other enemies within 5 meters. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.

When you deal damage with a fully-charged Heavy Attack, you create a web for 10 seconds that deals [n]1044[/n] Poison Damage every 1 second and reduces the Movement Speed of enemies within by [n]50%[/n]. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.

When you deal damage, you have a [n]10%[/n] chance to create a thunderfist to crush the enemy, dealing [n]1500[/n] Shock Damage every 1 second for 3 seconds to all enemies within 4 meters and a final [n]8000[/n] Physical Damage when the fist closes. This effect can occur once every 8 seconds.

When you take damage, you have a [n]6%[/n] chance to transform into a skeleton and gain Major Protection and Minor Defile for 12 seconds, reducing your damage taken by [n]30%[/n] but reducing your healing received by [n]15%[/n]. This effect can occur once every 15 seconds.

When you deal damage with a Light or Heavy Attack, you have a [n]10%[/n] chance to summon a fire breathing Daedroth for 15 seconds. The Daedra's basic attacks deals [n]4257[/n] Physical Damage. This effect can occur once every 15 seconds.

When you heal a friendly target, you have a [n]3%[/n] chance to summon a totem for 6 seconds that heals you and your allies in area for [n]3483[/n] Health every 1 second. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds.

When you taunt an enemy, you have a [n]50%[/n] chance to cause a duneripper to burst from the ground beneath them, dealing [n]6500[/n] Physical Damage to all enemies within 4 meters and reducing their Movement Speed by [n]70%[/n] for 8 seconds. This effect can occur once every 4 seconds.

When you deal Flame or Shock Damage, you have a [n]10%[/n] chance to summon a meteor shower of the damage type that deals [n]1300[/n] Damage to all enemies within 4 meteres every 1 seconds for 5 seconds. Each effect can occur once every 8 seconds.

When you heal a friendly target, you have a [n]10%[/n] chance to summon a dwemer spider that heals for [n]1049[/n] Health and restores [n]524[/n] Stamina to you and your allies within 5 meters every 1 second for 8 seconds. This effect can occur once every 8 seconds.
Allows you to have two Mundus Stone Boons at the same time.
When your target is under [n]25%[/n] Health, add [n]1800[/n] Weapon Damage to your Light and Heavy Attacks.
When you cast a Magicka ability, you have an [n]8%[/n] chance to negate that ability's cost.
Critical attacks also reduce the target's Physical Resistance by [n]2580[/n] for 6 seconds.
Ignore movement speed penalty while sneaking.
When you cast a Magicka ability you gain Major Evasion for 3 seconds, increaseing your dodge chance by [n]20%[/n]. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds.
Your Melee Attacks Deal [n]6720[/n] Poison Damage. This effect can oocur once every 4 seconds

Adds [n]400[/n] Spell Damage to your Shock Damage abilities.
When you set an enemy off-balance, your Weapon Damage is increased by [n]450[/n] for 10 seconds.

When you deal direct damage with a Frost Damage ability, you have a [n]50%[/n] chance to deal an additional [n]1046[/n] Flame Damage to all enemies within 8 meters around the initial target. This effect can occur once every 1 second.
When you take damage from a melee attack while you are under [n]80%[/n] Magicka, restore [n]8000[/n] Magicka. This effect can occur once every 30 seconds.
When you block a spell projectile, you have a [n]25%[/n] chance of reflecting the spell back to the enemy.
Adds [n]400[/n] Weapon Damage to your Dual Wield abilities.
After casting an ability that costs Magicka, Light Attacks deal [n]774[/n] additional damage and Heavy Attacks deal [n]1161[/n] additional damage for 10 seconds.
Gain Minor Force at all times, increasing your Critical Damage by [n]12%[/n].
When you activate your Ultimate, you heal you and your allies within 20 meters of you for 30 Health per point of the Ultimate's cost.

When an enemy within 28 meters of you dies, you gain Major Berserk, increasing your damage done by [n]25%[/n] for 3 seconds.
When your alchemical poison fires, deal [n]7740[/n] Poison Damage to all enemies within 5 meters of you.

When you take damage, you have a [n]10%[/n] chance to cast a web around you for 5 seconds, reducing the Movement Speed of enemies within by [n]50%[/n]. After 5 seconds the web bursts in to venom, dealing [n]2580[/n] Poison Damage and applying Minor Fracture to any enemy hit for 5 seconds, reducing their Physical Resistance by [n]1320[/n].

Gain Major Brutality at all times, increasing your Weapon Damage by [n]20%[/n]. When you kill an enemy, you gain Major Expedition for 20 seconds, increasing your Movement Speed by [n]30%[/n].

Reduces the duration of immobilizations and snares on you by [n]50%[/n]. When an immobilization or snare is applied to you, heal for [n]2000[/n] Health and restore [n]1000[/n] Stamina. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.

When you block an attack, you have a [n]50%[/n] chance to charge your arms, causing your next Bash attack to deal [n]5805[/n] Shock Damage as well as granting yourself [n]6450[/n] Spell Resistance for 6 seconds.

hen you deal melee damage, you apply Major Defile to the enemy for 5 seconds, reducing their healing received by [n]30%[/n] . This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.
hen you block an attack, you have a [n]33%[/n] chance to blind your attacker, causing them to miss all of their attacks for 5 seconds. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.
